Class Game

java.lang.Object
  Game

public class Game
extends Object

Constructor Summary
Game()
          Constructor Creates a new gameboard and populates its vertices with cows.
 
Method Summary
 String computerChoosesMonsters()
          Calls the ComputerPlayer method chooseMonsters to choose a monster, and changes the mode to computerKillsCow.
 String computerGuessesMonster()
          Uses the computerPlayer method guessMonster to kill a cow that has been scared the most number of times, and if the round is over, changes the mode to round1Over; if the cow guessed was not a monster, changes the mode to userKillsCow; if JEF was correct or there are no more moves, he guesses again; also updates the computer score.
 String computerKillsCow()
          Calls the ComputerPlayer method killCow to kill a cow and updates the information about the scared cows; if the game is over, changes the mode to gameOver and update the scores, otherwise updates the mode to computerMovesScaredCows.
 String computerMovesCows()
          JEF randomly moves cows at the beginning of the game; changes the mode to userChoosesMonsters.
 String computerMovesScaredCows()
          Calls the ComputerPlayer method moveScaredCow to move a scared cow, and updates this cow to no longer be scared.; if all of the scared cows have been moved, change the mode to userGuessesMonster.
 Cow getCow(int index)
          Calls the GameBoard getCow method to return a cow object given an index representing its location.
 LinkedList<Integer> getCowsAdjacentToMonsters()
          Uses the gameBoard method to get all the cows adjacent to the monsters.
 String getCurrentScores()
          Returns a String containing the current scores of JEF and the player.
 int getFinalScore()
          Returns playerScore - computerScore, which is the final score of the game.
 GameBoard getGameBoard()
          Returns the GameBoard object in Game.
 String getHighScores()
          Returns a String containing the list of the top 10 scores.
 LinkedList<LinkedList<String>> getListOfScaredCows()
          Returns the list keeping track of how many times each cow has been scared.
 LinkedList<Integer> getLivingMonsters()
          Calls the getLivingMonsters method in GameBoard to get a list of the indices of all living monsters.
 String getMode()
          Returns a String indicating the current mode the game is in.
 boolean isGameOver()
          If there are no more living monsters or not more living cows, returns true.
static void main(String[] args)
          Main method for local testing
 String moveCow(int index1, int index2)
          Calls the GameBoard moveCow method to move a cow, given the index of the cow and the index of its desired location.
 void newGame()
          Resets the entire game to prepare for a new game.
 void resetGame()
          Resets the game (except for the mode and round and computerScore) to prepare for the second round.
 void saveScores(String fileName)
          Saves the list of high scores to a file with the specified name.
 void setName(String name)
          Sets the name of the player to be the given name.
 String toString()
          Calls the GameBoard toString method to print the gameBoard.
 void updateScores()
          Updates the list of high scores and calls saveScores to save the updated list to the external txt file; only allows the players who have the top 10 scores to remain in this list.
 String userChoosesMonster(int index)
          JEF randomly moves cows at the beginning of the game; does not change the mode because another method is provided to check whether the user is done choosing monsters.
 String userDoneChoosingMonsters()
          Changes the mode to userKillsCow.
 String userDoneMovingCows()
          Changes the mode to computerChoosesMonsters.
 String userGuessesMonster(int index)
          If the cow at the given index is allowed to be guessed (it is not dead or invisible) then it is killed, and if the game is over, change the mode to gameOver and update the scores; if the cow was a monster or if JEF has no more moves the mode stays the same, but if the cow was not a monster the mode changes to computerKillsCow.
 String userKillsCow(int index)
          Kills a selected cow, if it is allowed to be killed, makes the surrounding cows scared and updates the list of scared cows; If successful, changes the mode to userMovesScaredCows, and if the round is over, changes the mode to round1Over instead.
 String userMovesCow(int index1, int index2)
          Calls the moveCow method to move a cow; does not change the mode because there is another method to do that.
 String userMovesScaredCow(int index1, int index2)
          Given the index of the current cow and the index to move the cow to, moves a scared cow and makes the cow no longer scared; when all of the scared cows have been moved, changes the mode to computerGuessesMonster.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Game

public Game()
Constructor Creates a new gameboard and populates its vertices with cows.

Method Detail

computerMovesCows

public String computerMovesCows()
JEF randomly moves cows at the beginning of the game; changes the mode to userChoosesMonsters.

Returns:
Returns a string indicating the result of JEF having moved cows.

userChoosesMonster

public String userChoosesMonster(int index)
JEF randomly moves cows at the beginning of the game; does not change the mode because another method is provided to check whether the user is done choosing monsters.

Parameters:
index - The index of the chosen cow.
Returns:
Returns a string indicating the result of the player's move.

userDoneChoosingMonsters

public String userDoneChoosingMonsters()
Changes the mode to userKillsCow.

Returns:
Returns a string indicating the result.

userKillsCow

public String userKillsCow(int index)
Kills a selected cow, if it is allowed to be killed, makes the surrounding cows scared and updates the list of scared cows; If successful, changes the mode to userMovesScaredCows, and if the round is over, changes the mode to round1Over instead.

Parameters:
index - The index of the selected cow.
Returns:
Returns a string indicating the result of the player's move.

getCowsAdjacentToMonsters

public LinkedList<Integer> getCowsAdjacentToMonsters()
Uses the gameBoard method to get all the cows adjacent to the monsters.

Returns:
Returns a LinkedList containing the cows adjacent to the monsters.

userMovesScaredCow

public String userMovesScaredCow(int index1,
                                 int index2)
Given the index of the current cow and the index to move the cow to, moves a scared cow and makes the cow no longer scared; when all of the scared cows have been moved, changes the mode to computerGuessesMonster.

Parameters:
index1 - The current index of the cow to move.
index2 - The location to move the cow to.
Returns:
Returns a String indicating the result of the player's move.

computerGuessesMonster

public String computerGuessesMonster()
Uses the computerPlayer method guessMonster to kill a cow that has been scared the most number of times, and if the round is over, changes the mode to round1Over; if the cow guessed was not a monster, changes the mode to userKillsCow; if JEF was correct or there are no more moves, he guesses again; also updates the computer score.

Returns:
Returns a String indicating the result of the move.

userMovesCow

public String userMovesCow(int index1,
                           int index2)
Calls the moveCow method to move a cow; does not change the mode because there is another method to do that.

Parameters:
index1 - The index of the cow to be moved.
index2 - The index of the location to move it to.
Returns:
Returns a String indicating the result of the move.

userDoneMovingCows

public String userDoneMovingCows()
Changes the mode to computerChoosesMonsters.

Returns:
Returns a String indicating the result of the move.

computerChoosesMonsters

public String computerChoosesMonsters()
Calls the ComputerPlayer method chooseMonsters to choose a monster, and changes the mode to computerKillsCow.

Returns:
Returns a String indicating the result of the move.

computerKillsCow

public String computerKillsCow()
Calls the ComputerPlayer method killCow to kill a cow and updates the information about the scared cows; if the game is over, changes the mode to gameOver and update the scores, otherwise updates the mode to computerMovesScaredCows.

Returns:
Returns a String indicating the result of the move.

computerMovesScaredCows

public String computerMovesScaredCows()
Calls the ComputerPlayer method moveScaredCow to move a scared cow, and updates this cow to no longer be scared.; if all of the scared cows have been moved, change the mode to userGuessesMonster.

Returns:
Returns a String indicating the result of the move.

userGuessesMonster

public String userGuessesMonster(int index)
If the cow at the given index is allowed to be guessed (it is not dead or invisible) then it is killed, and if the game is over, change the mode to gameOver and update the scores; if the cow was a monster or if JEF has no more moves the mode stays the same, but if the cow was not a monster the mode changes to computerKillsCow.

Parameters:
index - The index of the cow to be guessed.
Returns:
Returns a String indicating the result of the move.

getListOfScaredCows

public LinkedList<LinkedList<String>> getListOfScaredCows()
Returns the list keeping track of how many times each cow has been scared.

Returns:
Returns the LinkedList> keeping track of how many times each cow has been scared.

getCow

public Cow getCow(int index)
Calls the GameBoard getCow method to return a cow object given an index representing its location.

Parameters:
index - The index of the cow to return.
Returns:
Returns a cow object.

moveCow

public String moveCow(int index1,
                      int index2)
Calls the GameBoard moveCow method to move a cow, given the index of the cow and the index of its desired location.

Parameters:
index1 - The index of the cow to be moved.
index2 - The index of the location to move the cow to.
Returns:
Returns a message indicating the result of the move.

public String getMode()
Returns a String indicating the current mode the game is in.

isGameOver

public boolean isGameOver()
If there are no more living monsters or not more living cows, returns true.

Returns:
Returns a boolean indicating whether the game is over or not.

getFinalScore

public int getFinalScore()
Returns playerScore - computerScore, which is the final score of the game.

Returns:
Returns an int indicating the final score.

updateScores

public void updateScores()
Updates the list of high scores and calls saveScores to save the updated list to the external txt file; only allows the players who have the top 10 scores to remain in this list.

saveScores

public void saveScores(String fileName)
Saves the list of high scores to a file with the specified name.

Parameters:
fileName - The name of the file to save the scores to.

getLivingMonsters

public LinkedList<Integer> getLivingMonsters()
Calls the getLivingMonsters method in GameBoard to get a list of the indices of all living monsters.

Returns:
Returns a LinkedList containing the indices of the living monsters.

resetGame

public void resetGame()
Resets the game (except for the mode and round and computerScore) to prepare for the second round.

Resets the entire game to prepare for a new game.
